Review.title: Review
Review.description: Represents a user review for a project.

authorName.description: The name of the person who wrote the review.

comment.description: The text content of the review.

rating.description: The rating given in the review (e.g., on a scale of 1 to 5).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the review was created.

userId.description: The UID of the user who submitted the review.

likes.description: The number of likes the review has received.

dislikes.description: The number of dislikes the review has received.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project showcased on the portfolio website.

description.description: A brief description of the project.

techStack.description: An array of technologies used in the project.

githubLink.description: Link to the project's GitHub repository.

liveDemoLink.description: Link to the live demo of the project.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores project details. Each document represents a single project.

/reviews/{reviewId}.description: Stores reviews for the portfolio. Each document is a review.
